SEARCH
Module RobotGUI
Package application

Class BasicRobot

java.lang.Object
application.Robot
application.BasicRobot
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdvancedRobot, KillerRobot, TeleportingRobot, UserControlledRobot
public class BasicRobot extends Robot
Represents a Basic Robot that moves within the arena, has sensors to detect obstacles, and can adjust its behavior based on sensor inputs.

  • Method Details

    • contains

      public boolean contains(double mouseX, double mouseY)
      Checks if the robot's position contains the mouse coordinates (for selection).
      Overrides:
      contains in class Robot
      Parameters:
      mouseX - The x-coordinate of the mouse.
      mouseY - The y-coordinate of the mouse.
      Returns:
      True if the mouse is within the robot's radius, false otherwise.

    • drawRobot

      public void drawRobot(MyCanvas mc)
      Draws the robot on the canvas.
      Overrides:
      drawRobot in class Robot
      Parameters:
      mc - The MyCanvas object to draw the robot.

    • move

      public void move(double xLimit, double yLimit)
      Moves the robot within the arena and checks for wall collisions. If a collision is detected, the robot will turn to avoid the obstacle.
      Specified by:
      move in class Robot
      Parameters:
      xLimit - The limit for the x-coordinate (arena width).
      yLimit - The limit for the y-coordinate (arena height).
